message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I can only pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $16,500,  given the value and condition of the product.  Let's meet in the middle.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm still unable to meet at $16,500. I would like to propose $15,500 as a fair price considering the market value.
